title: Mirror Matchups are anti fun (rant)
body: they don't allow you to really work on your champ nad his/her matchups, its very demotivating and to be frank. Bloody annoying!

replies.body: Mirror lanes decide who knows the champion better. It REALLY allows you to work on your champion, maybe not it's matchups but that's not up to a randomizer doing it for you, you should be able to tell by paper what hurts your champion and what your champion is good at, that enough tells you that Katarina is going to be able to dodge your triple shuriken burst very easily by shunpo-ing behind you. Nothing is better for learning your champion than mirrored 1v1s. Is your way of playing the champion beating your opponent's? Congratulations, you're playing your Champion well and should seek a more challenging opponent. You lost? Pick up that pen and notepad.
